title: Jack Brown
text: I recently graduated with Master of Science degree in Statistics from Cal Poly, San Luis Obispo. I love using my domain knowledge and computational skills to better understand the world around me, in both a personal and professional context. Thank you for stopping by, please feel free to take a look around my website!

title: Jack Brown

title: Projects
text:
Machine Learning in RThesisGraphic DesignOh Hell Project


In this project for STAT 551 at Cal Poly, we produced a mock document for the American Stroke Association and the Alzheimer’s Association that used machine learning to help identify key risks of stroke and Alzheimer’s. The predictive machine learning models we created can assist doctors in making proper diagnoses and quickly begin preventative or early treatment. This project demonstrates my machine learning, data visualization, and data summary skills in R.



My thesis project for my Master of Science in Statistics degree at Cal Poly was an analysis of the impact of the. new Video Assistant Referee (VAR) technology in the biggest soccer league in the world, the English Premier League. The project process included extensive literature review, thorough statisical analysis using parametric and non-parametric methods, and web scraping, to which the code can be found here: https://github.com/jack23brown/Impact-of-VAR-on-the-EPL
